name: reticence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an unwillingness to do something or talk about something, for example because you are nervous or being careful: His reticence about his past made them very suspicious. I think my dad had a certain reticence about showing love as he was afraid that people would leave if he did. See
reticent
